title: Service Finder App
description: A modern web application that helps users discover and connect with local service providers efficiently. Featuring category-based search, real-time filtering, and a user-friendly interface, it demonstrates practical use of React, Tailwind CSS, and dynamic data handling.

title: My personal website
description: A sleek, interactive space that reflects my personality and journey as a front-end developer. It highlights my best projects, skills, and experiences through a modern design powered by React and Tailwind CSS.
